items.sentence: The only thing Tom ever wanted to do was watch TV.
The plane that Tom was on was struck by lightning.
The police are watching us from across the street.
This isn\'t the first time I\'ve ridden a bicycle.
Tom said he didn\'t want to buy anything for Mary.
Tom said he didn\'t want to do anything with Mary.
Tom said he had to go to the dentist\'s on Monday.
You\'re a little younger than Tom is, aren\'t you?
You\'re going in the wrong direction, aren\'t you?
You\'re going to be in trouble and it\'s my fault.
